message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest! While $13000 is closer, I'm still hoping to get a bit more. How about $13500?  I'm confident this price reflects the value of the product to you.
I understand your concerns, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to pay $13200 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the value it holds for me.
